modShortDescription: Adds nuts and bolts (a single item) into the game. Nuts and bolts are used in several recipes for crafting and repairing metal items.
modDescription:
Adds nuts and bolts (a single item) into the game.

## Details

* Nuts and bolts can be looted or crafted.
* Nuts and bolts are used in several recipes for crafting and repairing metal items.

## Changelog

Bugfixes. Thanks to xxx73 for reporting issues!

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a19/tree/main/Khelldon-AwwNuts)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-AwwNuts)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).
